0100111111111000 0000010001111001 0 -> sum: 0101010001110001, cout: 0
1111110110101001 0011101101100011 1 -> sum: 0011100100001101, cout: 1
1011010100001100 1100110111011011 1 -> sum: 1000001011101000, cout: 1
